[...]

Hi Ken,

Thanks for the info and code upload. I need to do some backgroud reading 
but implementing leaky integrator neurons fits in nicely with my general 
plan of experimenting with different kinds of neurons and activation 
functions. I had already made a note to clarify precisely what LSTM is 
and where it should/could be used, but I had forgotten about Tyler's 
work and the leaky integreator stuff.

Naturally I'll be keeping everyone posted.

Colin.
